narrative.narrative: Rotana Jet is an airlinr based at Abu Dhabi's Al Bateen Executive Airport. It was founded in 2010 and did executive charter flights before starting scheduled service in June 2012, including a flight to Fujairah making it the first domestic airline to connect two emirates. It flies internationally to Bahrain, two airports in Oman and two airports in Sri Lanka. Seven domestic airports are served. As of 2014 they had two A319's, one in VIP configuration. And also two Embraer ERJ145's and a Gulfstream G450. It also has been a member of the Arab Air Carriers Organization since 2011.
